column1: Census division and state or area

column10: SOURCE: Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services.

NOTES: Medicare program payments represent fee-for-service only and exclude amounts paid for managed care services. Swing-bed hospital services are included in the total use and cost of Medicare skilled nursing facility services.
          Totals do not necessarily equal the sum of rounded components.
a. Includes skilled nursing facility admissions with at least one day of covered care under Medicare.
b. The denominator used to calculate the average program payment per covered admission includes only those bills with Medicare reimbursement greater than zero.
